32 typedef struct VoipCommonRefT
33 {
34  VoipConnectionlistT Connectionlist; //!< virtual connection list
35  VoipHeadsetRefT *pHeadset; //!< voip headset manager
36 
37  VoipCallbackT *pCallback; //!< voip event callback (optional)
38  void *pUserData; //!< user data for voip event callback
39 
40  NetCritT ThreadCrit; //!< critical section used for thread synchronization
41  uint8_t bApplyChannelConfig; //!< apply channel configs on the next voip thread pass
42 
43  uint32_t uLastFrom; //!< most recent from status, used for callback tracking
44  uint32_t uLastHsetStatus; //!< most recent headset status, used for callback tracking
45  uint32_t uLastLocalStatus[VOIP_MAXLOCALUSERS]; //!< most recent local status, used for callback tracking
46  uint32_t uPortHeadsetStatus; //!< bitfield indicating which ports have headsets
47 
48  uint8_t bUseDefaultSharedChannelConfig; //!< whether we use the default shared config or not (only supported on xbox one)
49  uint8_t bPrivileged; //!< whether we are communication-privileged or not
50  uint8_t _pad[2];
51 
52  uint32_t uRemoteChannelSelection[VOIP_MAX_LOW_LEVEL_CONNS][VOIP_MAXLOCALUSERS_EXTENDED]; //<! coded, per remote user, channel selection
53  uint32_t uLocalChannelSelection[VOIP_MAXLOCALUSERS_EXTENDED]; //<! coded, per local user, channel selection
54 
55  int32_t iDefaultSharedChannels[VOIP_MAX_CONCURRENT_CHANNEL]; //<! use to store the default shared channel config
56  uint32_t uDefaultSharedModes[VOIP_MAX_CONCURRENT_CHANNEL]; //<! use to store the default shared channel mode
57  int32_t iCustomSharedChannels[VOIP_MAX_CONCURRENT_CHANNEL]; //<! use to store the custom shared channel config
58  uint32_t uCustomSharedModes[VOIP_MAX_CONCURRENT_CHANNEL]; //<! use to store the custom shared channel mode
59  int32_t iLocalChannels[VOIP_MAXLOCALUSERS_EXTENDED][VOIP_MAX_CONCURRENT_CHANNEL]; //<! channels selected locally
60  uint32_t uLocalModes[VOIP_MAXLOCALUSERS_EXTENDED][VOIP_MAX_CONCURRENT_CHANNEL]; //<! channel modes selected locally
61 
62  uint32_t uChanRecvMask; //<! the recv mask associated with the channel selection
63  uint32_t uChanSendMask; //<! the send mask associated with the channel selection
64 
65  uint32_t uUserSpkrValue;
66  uint32_t uUserMicrValue;
67 
68 } VoipCommonRefT;
